title: EmpowNetwork
author: EmpowNetwork
content: Do you think the value of Santos token will increase? Since Santos is constantly listed on reputable centralized exchanges such as Binance, Gate, MEXC… it is undeniably affirming its position in the community. But after all, Fan Token is just a lottery coin created for the purpose of attracting cash flow into the market. So perhaps Santos token just serves as a refreshment for this crypto winter. If you decide to participate in Fan Token investment, then start with small capital and accept that it is possible to lose. Remember to have a plan for your investments before entering. Good luck!!!  And don't forget to check out the full investigative article about Santos on Hackernoon:https://hackernoon.com/is-there-still-room-for-santos-to-grow

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Santos Token doesn't go up when Bitcoin surges, this token likes doing things on it's own, I think you should be aware of this.June 2022 was the best time anyone should have buy Santos Token, it was trading for 3.5$ at the time and now it's 11$, I think buying now is too high risk. World cup is coming, Projects like Santos Token and others should appreciate in value.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on October 28, 2022, 09:29:18 AMSantos Token doesn't go up when Bitcoin surges, this token likes doing things on it's own, I think you should be aware of this.June 2022 was the best time anyone should have buy Santos Token, it was trading for 3.5$ at the time and now it's 11$, I think buying now is too high risk. World cup is coming, Projects like Santos Token and others should appreciate in value. I have seen cases when people thought the price of a token was too high at the price it was trading only for the price to keep surging because of the utility and demand of the project. Have you checked the previous ATH of santos? there is a high probability it will achieve it and even higher. The supply is just 30m which is another reason to boost the price. This is a fan-base coin and the price movement may or may not go alongside btc, but one thing to note is... if it can perform even in bear market then expect an even better performance in bull market.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Never heard of this fan token.(https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/santos-fc-fan-token/)But it seems that they've got a huge market volume and there's a lot of markets that it has got from different exchanges. With its historical chart, the launching price was $16 and then its ATH was $20. The current price is $11 and that's not far from those heights that it has got.If it will maintain its good posture for its volume, I think that it'll raise its ranking from 350.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: It's better to ask this directly on the coin's main discussion group if any, whether in Telegram, Discord, etc.In that way, you can share views with your fellow speculators of this token and maybe you can encounter discussions between critics and believers and see how their argument is going. You should also see there how the team is responding to those.That's my first pit-stop when choosing a coin, searching for general views of the community about that certain coin.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: EmpowNetwork on October 28, 2022, 03:16:15 AMDo you think the value of Santos token will increase? Since Santos is constantly listed on reputable centralized exchanges such as Binance, Gate, MEXC… it is undeniably affirming its position in the community. But after all, Fan Token is just a lottery coin created for the purpose of attracting cash flow into the market. So perhaps Santos token just serves as a refreshment for this crypto winter. If you decide to participate in Fan Token investment, then start with small capital and accept that it is possible to lose. Remember to have a plan for your investments before entering. Good luck!!!  They are able to reach that good exchanges but of course it's not guaranteed that it will rise because of that, SANTOS token this to continue to update as well and with that I believe it's more chance for this token to make a new ATH again once the whole market enters into a bull market. There's a good volume for this token and that could be a good indication that there's a demand for this token. Do some research first before you invest, know it's purpose and it's market.

comments.author: carlfebz2
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on October 28, 2022, 07:05:47 PMQuote from: EmpowNetwork on October 28, 2022, 03:16:15 AMDo you think the value of Santos token will increase? Since Santos is constantly listed on reputable centralized exchanges such as Binance, Gate, MEXC… it is undeniably affirming its position in the community. But after all, Fan Token is just a lottery coin created for the purpose of attracting cash flow into the market. So perhaps Santos token just serves as a refreshment for this crypto winter. If you decide to participate in Fan Token investment, then start with small capital and accept that it is possible to lose. Remember to have a plan for your investments before entering. Good luck!!!  They are able to reach that good exchanges but of course it's not guaranteed that it will rise because of that, SANTOS token this to continue to update as well and with that I believe it's more chance for this token to make a new ATH again once the whole market enters into a bull market. There's a good volume for this token and that could be a good indication that there's a demand for this token. Do some research first before you invest, know it's purpose and it's market. This is for all projects out there which they do really have the chance on getting their prices go to the rooftop but of course, it would really be depending or varying on some factors which could really be putting themup on such condition which is DEMAND, RECOGNITION simply in the market.No matter how shitty it is, as long it would be hyped or been bought by people or investor then it would be having the chance.Come to mind that there are some good potential projects but ending up on having no support or having low value? Why? Because they do lack up into those factorsthat i had mentioned above. When you do believe that Santos token does have the potential then go ahead and invest.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: EmpowNetwork on October 28, 2022, 03:16:15 AMDo you think the value of Santos token will increase? Since Santos is constantly listed on reputable centralized exchanges such as Binance, Gate, MEXC… it is undeniably affirming its position in the community. Binance and other top tier are just large marketing for these coins/tokens and we even see a lot of those delistings in the past that didn't end well, those aren't full-proof that they will succeed in the long term. I think it will just increase in value if they constantly provide more utility on the token and deliver what they ought to deliver on their roadmap.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Santos did nothing while BTC shows a green sign since yesterday. Im sure that if fan token doesn't got affected by the price movement happened with bitcoin. Im judging from the pump that happened during market. Santos got pumped so hard when bitcoin dumped so hard. There's no doubt if fan token used by the whales to create a pump. The value of santos will be determined by pumpers. It's caused by fan token doesn't have real utilities unlike another altcoins in the market. Santos was just a fan token that created as a way for fan to support the club. Im not even considering it as an investment. it's pretty much the same like meme token in the market.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: This is one of the Fan token launch by Binance. Typically this tokens gained some random hype which we don't know exactly who's doing it but many said Binance usually pump there own coin to boost there own reputation. Fan token has no demand and minimal utility so the potential price growth when you look on token feature itself is not high but since this is Binance launch. Price increase is highly possible but no estimated time for this.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on October 29, 2022, 04:51:08 PMThis is one of the Fan token launch by Binance. Typically this tokens gained some random hype which we don't know exactly who's doing it but many said Binance usually pump there own coin to boost there own reputation. Fan token has no demand and minimal utility so the potential price growth when you look on token feature itself is not high but since this is Binance launch. Price increase is highly possible but no estimated time for this. Now it's clear to me where this token coming from I thought it's something like a LUNAC again but what else could we think since most of these token are showing up because of the hype. Binance has this type of token in every occasion I came across with them and it seems we can't stop this type of token to be showing as a type of pump and dump token that's obviously be gone for good in no time. It just never stop since almost every day there's always a new hype coming after one another.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: Quote from: Crypt0Gore on October 28, 2022, 09:29:18 AMSantos Token doesn't go up when Bitcoin surges, this token likes doing things on it's own, I think you should be aware of this.June 2022 was the best time anyone should have buy Santos Token, it was trading for 3.5$ at the time and now it's 11$, I think buying now is too high risk. World cup is coming, Projects like Santos Token and others should appreciate in value. Isn't it great if this token move on its own? That means it is possible for this coin to go up when bitcoin and the rest of the coins are dumping hard. If you are bored and eager to earn during a bear like this then we can also allocate small amounts on this coin.Only use the coin for doing short term trades and not for a long term investment because I believe that coins like this are only like a meme coin and they will collapse hard once the certain hype or event has passed. We must also be careful on investing in similar coins because I know that a lot of them are going to pop out, the closer we get to the world cup but most of them are only just a scam.

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on October 29, 2022, 04:51:08 PMThis is one of the Fan token launch by Binance. Typically this tokens gained some random hype which we don't know exactly who's doing it but many said Binance usually pump there own coin to boost there own reputation. Fan token has no demand and minimal utility so the potential price growth when you look on token feature itself is not high but since this is Binance launch. Price increase is highly possible but no estimated time for this. Personally, I have never heard of this coin before but it is indeed one of the Fan tokens launched by Binance. I also don't really see any real usercase for this coin but if the team would do great, it can create some hype and the price will probably also pump.

comments.author: kawetsriyanto
comments.body: Do you mean this token https://www.coingecko.com/id/koin_koin/santos-fc-fan-token?I just know this token, I think the concept is the same as other fans tokens. Sure, there should be a chance for this token to increase its value but it depends on the popularity of the clubs and the use of the token itself in the future. However, I am not a person who likes to invest in fans tokens because I don't see a big use for that tokens. Mostly those tokens are only pump-dump tokens, and they rely on the news related to the improvement of the token usecase.
